posts.name: Blackbrick Chinese and Dim Sum
posts.note: Blackbrick Chinese and Dim Sum is a chef-owned Chinese restaurant serving dim sum, mains, and wine in a funky, contemporary space. From their website, ‘Blackbrick stylized but playful interior was designed by Chef Hales himself and menu was created from his travels in China, experience in NYC and collaboration with Chef Feng, his Chinese Chef. The design and menu speak to the mind of Chef Hales, funky, adventurous, and a focus on good homey food.’ From the Food Network website, ‘For a modern take on regional Chinese cuisine, head to Blackbrick. Dim sum options include crystal shrimp dumplings, chicken siu mei, cumin-lamb dumplings, and barbecued pork buns. Noodles are made in-house for dishes like the dan dan mian, which tosses spicy Szechuan pork ragu with bucatini. Guy is obsessed with dan dan mian. “I can’t figure out how to get it in my face fast enough,” said Guy between bites. The dishes they recommend are Har Gow Shrimp Dumpling, Xinjiang Cumin-Lamb Dumpling, Dan Dan Mian, Gong Bao Rabbit, Grandma’s Red Oxtail, and General Tso’s Florida Gator.

posts.name: Blue Collar
posts.note: BBlue Collar serves comfort-food favorites are bumped up a notch at this American restaurant with '70s-inspired style. They're a small restaurant located in the historic MIMO district of Miami that serves food that people like to eat. Which includes a daily rotation of braised dishes, parmesans, ribs, and an unprecedented variety of vegetables. You need to order the Big Ragout Sandwich which is served in a hollowed-out crusty bread, with pork and veal shoulder, and brisket along with provolone and parmesan cheese. From the Miami Eater website, 'Big fan of NY strip? The prime, juicy patty in Blue Collar’s dry-aged cheeseburger is accompanied by melted cheese, lettuce, tomato, and onion. It’s served on a semi-sweet Portuguese muffin, a satisfying combination with every bite. Comfort food done right is the ethos behind longtime Miami favorite Blue Collar. Its menu boasts an impressive list of 20 vegetable dishes and a chocolate cake so decadent that it comes with its own glass of milk.'

posts.name: La Sandwicherie
posts.note: La Sandwicherie is a no-frills counter space dispensing gourmet sandwiches on French bread plus salads and smoothies. As their name states get yourself some sandwiches. From their website, 'Serving heavenly sandwiches in Miami Beach since 1988, La Sandwicherie captures the best French savoir-faire in the simplest of settings to transport your taste buds to another world without costing you the earth. Daily fresh ingredients, crisp baguettes or soft croissants, and the added magic of the infamous vinaigrette make for a true taste sensation. Since Franz and Elise have been heading La Sandwicherie, they created the La Sandwicherie Group to increase the number of locations in Florida. A must-see in Miami Beach, Brickell, Wynwood, North Beach, and Coral Gables.' NOTE: The have multiple locations.

posts.name: The Local Craft Food and Drink
posts.note: The Local Craft Food and Drink is a welcoming spot for elevated comfort food, craft beer, and cocktails in snug, exposed-brick quarters. You need to order the Hen Dumpling Soup, Bone Marrow, and the Lamb Belly BLT. From the Miami Eater website, ‘The Local burger stands tall with its double patties, double cheese, chopped bacon, dill pickles, and Mississippi Comeback sauce. It tends to sell out, so coming in early or calling ahead is always recommended. On Mondays, score a burger and a beer for $15.’

posts.name: Mr. and Mrs. Bun
posts.note: Gian Carlo Accinelli and his wife are putting their love on the line all in the name of their buns at Mr. and Mrs. Bun. The Peruvian couple serve all of their unique sandwiches on their signature, house-made buns. For the Asado con Palta sandwich, slow-cooked eye of round is piled on a fresh bun with avocado and crispy onions and then served with the jus from the cooked meat. Orderthe Asado con Palta, Pollo Chi Jao Kai, or Aji de Gallina Bites.

posts.name: Versailles Cuban Bakery
posts.note: Versailles Cuban Bakery is a large, stylish eatery with a selection of cakes, baked items, sandwiches, and savory eats. From their website, 'We bake from traditional Spanish-Cuban to modern baked goods like cupcakes and cheesecakes. We carry a wide variety of pastries and cakes for you and your loved ones. Indulge in our succulent sweet and salty menu with hundreds of items to choose from. Versailles brews its own blend of premium espresso, Cafe La Carreta, which is considered the best cafecito in town. The crowd sipping on this ambrosia ranges from old Cuban men  discussing politics to young adults getting their caffeine fix before  hitting the beach.'

posts.name: Whisk Gourmet
posts.note: Whisk Gourmet is a modern and spacious cafe serving American dishes with Southern flair, plus gourmet take-home meals. Order the deep-fried fish or the beer braised pork ribs. From their website, 'Homestyle meals and feels are what make Whisk Gourmet a South Miami staple. Open for lunch, dinner, or the uber-popular brunch, Whisk whips up crowd-pleasing plates like the Gnarly Biscuit BEC “Sandwich” and open-faced fried chicken BLT.' From the Miami Eater website, 'Homestyle meals and feels are what make Whisk Gourmet a South Miami staple. Open for lunch, dinner, or the uber-popular brunch, Whisk whips up crowd-pleasing plates like the Gnarly Biscuit BEC “Sandwich” and open-faced fried chicken BLT.'

posts.name: Yardbird Southern Table and Bar
posts.note: Yardbird Southern Table and Bar is a rustic outpost attracting foodies with inventive farm-to-table Southern comfort food and bourbon bar. You need to order the deviled eggs and the shrimp and grits. From their website, 'With accolades from James Beard and Bon Appétit, Yardbird pays tribute to the craveable American classics that bring people together. Guests can indulge in brunch, lunch, dinner, and a curated cocktail program highlighting a dynamic collection of bourbons. Yardbird takes guests on a culinary journey through a menu of unapologetically indulgent dishes and heady bourbon cocktails. Serving up nationally acclaimed comfort food for more than a decade, it’s no secret our restaurant has garnered global fanfare.' NOTE: They have other locations around the United States.
